<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Logging Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v32.07/settings/logging"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"manageAlerts"}
```



Returns the logging settings.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request that uses basic auth to retrieve your logging details.

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/logging"
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

LoggingSettings are the logging settings

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"consoleAddress"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ConsoleAddress is the console address used by the admin to access the console, used for creating links for runtime events.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enableMetricsCollection"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"EnableMetricsCollection indicates whether metric collections feature is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"includeRuntimeLink"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"IncludeRuntimeLink indicates whether link to forensic event should be included in the output.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>stdout</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

LoggerSetting are a specific logger settings

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"allProcEvents"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AllProcEvents indicates whether any new spawned container process should generate an event source entry.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether log feature is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"verboseScan"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"VerboseScan indicates whether detailed scan (Compliance/Vulnerability) result should be written to event logger.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>syslog</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

SyslogSettings are the syslog settings

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"addr"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Addr is the remote address for sending events.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"allProcEvents"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AllProcEvents indicates whether any new spawned container process should generate an event source entry.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cert"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Cert is the server cert for dialing TLS syslogger.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether log feature is enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ID represents the user's custom identifier string.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"verboseScan"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"VerboseScan indicates whether detailed scan (Compliance/Vulnerability) result should be written to event logger.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"consoleAddress\": \"string\",\n  \"enableMetricsCollection\": true,\n  \"includeRuntimeLink\": true,\n  \"stdout\": {\n    \"allProcEvents\": true,\n    \"enabled\": true,\n    \"verboseScan\": true\n  },\n  \"syslog\": {\n    \"addr\": \"string\",\n    \"allProcEvents\": true,\n    \"cert\": \"string\",\n    \"enabled\": true,\n    \"id\": \"string\",\n    \"verboseScan\": true\n  }\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"default"}
